seo.description: Insider tips and local secrets for Corniglia. Authentic experiences, hidden viewpoints, local customs, and how to avoid crowds.

body.title: Insider Tips & Secrets
body.subtitle: Discover Corniglia like a local. Hidden spots, best times, local customs, and authentic experiences.

features.title: Best Time to Visit
features.description: Early morning or late afternoon. Most day-trippers skip Corniglia entirely due to the stairs.

features.title: Hidden Viewpoints
features.description: Walk past the church to western terrace for sunset. Cemetery path offers panoramic views without crowds.

features.title: Where Locals Go
features.description: Bar Terza Terra for morning coffee and evening aperitivo. Real village atmosphere, reasonable prices.

features.title: Best Wine Tasting
features.description: Visit Enoteca Il Pirun in late afternoon. Locals gather here to chat and taste local wines.

features.title: Skip the Crowds
features.description: Take the early morning train. Most tourists arrive mid-day and many skip Corniglia for easier villages.

features.title: Local Etiquette
features.description: This is a real village, not a theme park. Dress modestly, speak quietly, respect private property.
